text.div:
CodeSystemTaskCode (MY Core)

http://fhir.hie.moh.gov.my/CodeSystem/task-business-status-my-core

Codes indicating the type of action that is expected to be performed

name: CodeSystemTaskBusinessStatusMyCore
title: CodeSystemTaskBusinessStatusCode (MY Core)
description: Codes indicating the type of action that is expected to be performed

concept.definition: Task has been deemed as not arrived
Task is ready for dispatch
Task has been dispatched
Task has been accepted
Task has been finalized and ready to be acted upon
Task has been created but not yet active
Task has been sent to performing destination
Task has been initiated
Task has performed one of its expected outcome
Task subject is being interviewed
Task has arrived to its expected destination
Task has been received at expected receiver
Task midway in-progress and can no longer be aborted
Task has completed its final outcome by bypassing main processes in completion
Task ended prematurely
Task has completed but requires validation to complete the task
Task reach its final outcome (both pass or fail outcome)
Task has been rejected thus ended
Task has been kept on hold
Task has been verified
Task has been validated
